workflow.name: Build & deploy MVPs from text prompts with AI, GitHub & Vercel
workflow.description:
# ‚ö° Instant MVP Builder  
### *Idea, Build, and Deploy ‚Äî in Minutes, with AI*  
**by Varritech Technologies**

---

## üèóÔ∏è What Is It?

**Instant MVP Builder** is a plug-and-play n8n workflow that takes a plain-English app idea and turns it into a **fully deployed web application** ‚Äî without writing a single line of code.

Designed for founders, solopreneurs, and agencies, this system uses **AI agents**, **GitHub**, and **Vercel** to automatically:

- Analyze and structure the app idea
- Generate source code with GPT
- Deploy a live frontend to the web

---

## üß† How It Works

1. **Webhook Trigger**  
   Accepts a chat message or form input with a basic app idea.

2. **AI Prompt Agent (Langchain)**  
   Turns the message into structured specs (name, features, stack, etc).

3. **Code Generator Agent (OpenAI)**  
   Writes frontend code (React) tailored to the app spec.

4. **GitHub Integration**  
   Creates a new repo from a starter template and pushes the code.

5. **Vercel Deployment**  
   Deploys the app and returns a public URL ‚Äî all automatically.

---

## üîß Built With

- **n8n** ‚Äì Automation engine for flow orchestration  
- **Langchain + OpenAI** ‚Äì For AI-powered prompt and code creation  
- **GitHub API** ‚Äì To manage repositories  
- **Vercel API** ‚Äì For instant frontend deployment  
- **JavaScript** ‚Äì For logic and parsing

---

## üéØ Use Cases

- üöÄ Startup MVP generation  
- üß™ Hackathon-ready app builds  
- üé® Client landing page creation  
- üì¶ Internal tool prototypes  
- üí° ‚ÄúIdea-to-product‚Äù workflows

---

## üü® What Makes It Special?

- üß† **AI-generated code**, not templates  
- ‚öôÔ∏è **Fully automated** from input to deploy  
- üåç **Public app URL in minutes**  
- üß© **Easily customizable**: edit prompts, swap repo, or deploy elsewhere  
- üß± Includes **built-in sticky notes + Notion setup guide**

---

## üõ†Ô∏è What‚Äôs Included

- ‚úÖ Cleaned, import-ready `.json` file for n8n  
- ‚úÖ [Notion setup guide](https://varritech.notion.site/AI-Appointment-Setter-Setup-Guide-23584cf74b7a8049a4c9f0d7ed6a5cf0)  
- ‚úÖ In-flow sticky notes describing every node  
- ‚úÖ No hardcoded secrets ‚Äî ready for your credentials  
- ‚úÖ Lifetime access & updates for personal use

---

## üìÑ License

This workflow is licensed for **single-business or internal use**.

Need something more? We offer:

- ü§ù Resell licenses for agencies  
- üåü White-label customization  
- üîß Prompt tuning or backend extensions

---

## üëã About Varritech

**Varritech Technologies** is an AI-first development agency helping businesses go from idea to production 5√ó faster. We specialize in building autonomous engineering workflows, onboarding systems, sales funnels, and internal tools ‚Äî all powered by modern AI.

üì¨ christian@varritech.com  
üåê [varritech.com](https://varritech.com)

---

‚úÖ *Build smarter. Launch faster. Automate everything.*  
With **Instant MVP Builder**, your next app idea doesn‚Äôt need a dev ‚Äî just a trigger.
```

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
